original_text: Nevertheless they were disobedient, and rebelled against thee, and cast thy law behind their backs, and slew thy prophets which testified against them to turn them to thee, and they wrought great provocations.
korean_text: 그들은 순종하지 아니하고 주를 거역하며 주의 율법을 등지고 주께로 돌아오기를 권면하는 선지자들을 죽여 주를 심히 모독하였나이다

sentences.original_text: and cast thy law behind their backs
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님의 법을 등 뒤로 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: which testified against them to turn them to thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그 선지자들은 그들이 주님께로 돌아오도록 그들에게 증언했습니다
